name: ALTER (munouuwu)
description:
This platformer game was made in 2020 and it was my first project for learning Unity. Piskel was used to make the pixel art in this game. For creating the music and sfx, FL Studio was used. The game took roughly a month to make

Controls:
AD: Movement
WS: Climb up or down
Space: Jump, hold to jump higher
Shift: Dash (Can be done while airborne)
